channel.title: 0x00sec CTF Final Scores
channel.description:
The CTF is now over. There would of been 4 hours remaining but somehow the platform took a crap and i can't even export the team scores so i will post the teams that actually scored anything and following that the specifics of who captured a challenge first. Thanks to all the teams that participated in the first CTF I ever created I hope you all had fun. Congrats to The Lone Wolf for his amazing display of domination on this CTF.
## **1st Place**
TheLoneWolf Score - 1850
## **2nd Place**
Hostbusters Score - 1190
**3rd Place** DoItForTheShirts Score - 1160
**4th Place** Lacike Score - 1130
**5th Place** FlyingMonkey Score - 885
**6th Place** //Wecannevergethere Score - 845
**7th Place** Leeky Score - 770
**8th Place** NeedCashForPizza Score - 650
**9th Place** foobar Score - 425
**10th Place** RainbowBash Score - 275
**11th Place** NOP Score - 200
**12th Place** Standard Users Score - 200
**13th Place** Garvos Score - 100
**14th Place** Bowl's Law Score - 75
**15th Place** Tacobell Score - 75
Who beat challenges first:
Challenge Name - Team other teams that completed in order of completion:
**I Can't See - TheLoneWolf**
//wecannevergethere needcashforpizza flyingmonkey foobar lacike doitfortheshirts hostbusters
**Forward then Reverse - Leeky**
thelonewolf
**My Pants Don't Fit - Hostbusters**
leeky needcashforpizza nop bowl's law flyingmonkey standard users doitfortheshirts garvoss thelonewolf //wecannevergethere lacike rainbowbash tacobell
**A Closer Look - TheLoneWolf**
**A Little Time To Figure It Out - Doitfortheshirts**
leeky needcashforpizza hostbusters flyingmonkey garvoss standard users thelonewolf lacike //wecannevergethere
**Cryptic Wonders - Doitfortheshirts**
thelonewolf lacike needcashforpizza hostbusters leeky rainbowbash flyingmonkey foobar //wecannevergethere
**Rock n Roll - TheLoneWolf**
**Ancient Discovery - Hostbusters**
nop needcashforpizza standard users garvoss flyingmonkey doitfortheshirts thelonewolf lacike
**Can I Get Some Pork Sausages - Lacike**
hostbusters thelonewolf //wecannevergethere foobar doitfortheshirts tacobell
**Crack Rock - Lacike**
thelonewolf
**What The Deshi - TheLoneWolf**
flyingmonkey needcashforpizza lacike doitfortheshirts hostbusters
**Groaning At This Crypto - Doitfortheshirts**
thelonewolf lacike leeky hostbusters //wecannevergethere foobar
**My Kitty Ate My Homework - Doitfortheshirts**
nop hostbusters needcashforpizza garvoss flyingmonkey thelonewolf //wecannevergethere
**0x00sec - TheLoneWolf**
flyingmonkey
**What The Bleep - Doitfortheshirts**
flyingmonkey hostbusters thelonewolf
**Logic - Leeky**
nop needcashforpizza garvoss standard users doitfortheshirts bowl's law flying monkey thelonewolf //wecannevergethere lacike rainbowbash foobar
**Wizards - Hostbusters**
leeky nop needcashforpizza garvoss standard users doitfortheshirts bowl's law flying monkey thelonewolf //wecannevergethere lacike rainbowbash foobar

item.title: 0x00sec CTF Final Scores
item.dc:creator: fraq
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 2 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: 0x00sec CTF Final Scores
item.dc:creator: lacike
item.description:
Thank you @Deshi for great CTF. It was fun for me and I also learnt something new.
Congrats to @Towel aka TheLoneWolf, good job, man

Will be available some hints or solutions of CTF’s challenges on this forum? I am really wondering how to solve some of them

Read full topic
